page.title: 06A CHINA CLAY MINE MANAGER
page.content: The mine manager supervises the work of three pits. A typical day starts at 8.30 a.m. when he finds out how things have been going in the mining which continues for 24 hours a day, every day. At 9.30 he meets the pit Captains to discuss the maintenance, breakdowns, production, and schedules of the mobile plant. He ensures that repairs are carried out promptly and organizes the maintenance. Blasting occurs twice daily. the manager deals with complaints arising from noise, vibration, and dust. The rest of the day is spent on administration, showing people around and, most important of all, ensuring that the workforce are informed of all new safety procedures.
